info.title: SubscriptionClient
info.description: Subscription client provides an interface to create and manage Azure subscriptions programmatically.

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: enrollmentAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the enrollment account to which the subscription will be billed.

post.description: The operation to cancel a subscription

default.description: Describes the error if the operation is not successful.

post.description: The operation to rename a subscription

default.description: Describes the error if the operation is not successful.

post.description: The operation to enable a subscription

default.description: Describes the error if the operation is not successful.

get.description: Get the status of the pending Microsoft.Subscription API operations.

200.description: Successful completion of the asynchronous operation

202.description: Accepted. Subscription update is in progress.

Location.description: The URL where the status of the asynchronous operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The operation ID, which can be found from the Location field in the generate recommendation response header.

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.Subscription API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: The operation to create a new WebDirect or EA Azure subscription.

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: billingAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Microsoft Customer Agreement billing account for which you want to create the subscription.

parameters.name: billingProfileName
parameters.description: The name of the billing profile in the billing account for which you want to create the subscription.

parameters.name: invoiceSectionName
parameters.description: The name of the invoice section in the billing account for which you want to create the subscription.

post.description: The operation to create a new CSP subscription.

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: billingAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Microsoft Customer Agreement billing account for which you want to create the subscription.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

CanceledSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the canceled subscription

value.description: The ID of the canceled subscription

RenamedSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being renamed

value.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being renamed

EnabledSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being enabled

value.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being enabled

SubscriptionName.description: The new name of the subscription.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

AdPrincipal.description: Active Directory Principal who’ll get owner access on the new subscription.

subscriptionLink.description: The link to the new subscription. Use this link to check the status of subscription creation operation.

SubscriptionCreationParameters.description: Subscription Creation Parameters required to create a new Azure subscription.

displayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

owners.description: The list of principals that should be granted Owner access on the subscription. Principals should be of type User, Service Principal or Security Group.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available. Only valid when creating a subscription in a enrollment account scope.

ModernSubscriptionCreationParameters.description: The parameters required to create a new subscription.

displayName.description: The friendly name of the subscription.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the Azure plan. Azure plan determines the pricing and service-level agreement of the subscription.  Use 001 for Microsoft Azure Plan and 002 for Microsoft Azure Plan for DevTest.

costCenter.description: If set, the cost center will show up on the Azure usage and charges file.

owner.description: If specified, the AD principal will get owner access to the subscription, along with the user who is performing the create subscription operation

managementGroupId.description: The identifier of the management group to which this subscription will be associated.

ModernCspSubscriptionCreationParameters.description: The parameters required to create a new CSP subscription.

displayName.description: The friendly name of the subscription.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the Azure plan. Azure plan determines the pricing and service-level agreement of the subscription.  Use 001 for Microsoft Azure Plan and 002 for Microsoft Azure Plan for DevTest.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2019-10-01-preview
